about_the_game:
SUMMER IN THE CITY

Meet Summer Summerson, an eighteen year old girl from the middle of nowhere trying to achieve her dream of becoming a professional photographer.

After participating and winning an online photography contest, Summer receives an offer for a scholarship at one of the most prestigious art colleges in the country.

But in order to follow her dream she will have to leave her rural home and move into the big city, a new environment she never experienced before. Help Summer tackle that exciting new environment while meeting its quirky, sexy and kinky inhabitants.​

FEATURES

"Summer In The City" is a wholesome, funny, sexy and kinky adult visual novel where choices matter. The characters create a sexpositive environment around them, where consensual relationships, curiousity and self-determination are celebrated. The main protagonist Summer will have to deal with some typical coming-of-age drama every once in a while, but nothing of world ending proportions. The story is told via a slice-of-life narrative through a branching storyline. The game is mainly focused on female/female relationships but there is some bisexual content too, which is 100% optional.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains the detailed and explicit display of sexual interactions between two or more characters, masturbation, exhibitionism and several fetishes.

But in order to follow her dream she will have to leave her rural home and move into the big city, a new environment she never experienced before. Help Summer tackle that exciting new environment while meeting its quirky, sexy and kinky inhabitants.​

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Summer In The City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Meet Summer Summerson, an eighteen year old girl from the middle of nowhere trying to achieve her dream of becoming a professional photographer. "Summer In The City" is a wholesome and kinky adult visual novel with a slice-of-life narrative.
